modName: Shadowmere HD - Dark Brotherhood Elite Edition
summary:
A simple re-texture of Shadowmere to make him black, and more of a Dark Brotherhood player. Works very well with my other mod:  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2583 
Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/66g9qd.png[/IMG]

Tired of riding around on a bland horse? 
Shadowmere needs more respect in this game, and my re-texture can add a little of that respect.

This mod makes him more of a Dark Brotherhood mount, making him scarier, and of course, black.
What kind of Shadowmere is brown? Pah.

And even better, try out my armor mod to suit Shadowmere even more!
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2583 

Enjoy!
author: Snake
